BodyName: Committee on Civil and Human Rights
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Items.Title: Oversight - Advancing Diversity and Equity in NYC Public Schools.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Advancing Diversity and Equity in NYC Public Schools.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to conduct a biannual study on student access to home internet and electronic devices
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to conduct a biannual study on student access to home internet and electronic devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring annual reports on afterschool programs
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring annual reports on afterschool programs

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring all schools to stock airway clearance devices, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring all schools to stock airway clearance devices, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Education Department to adopt oral health education for all elementary school students.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Calling on the New York State Education Department to adopt oral health education for all elementary school students.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.5373/S.4735, known as the Protect Our Schools Act, in relation to protecting students, faculty and staff from civil arrest while attending or participating in school activities
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
